title: Ecto Testo
content:
This is fairly cool. The UI is self-explanatory. However, I wonder if this will really make me want to post more to the blog area. Most of the thoughts I have which aren't Typophile friendly still don't qualify as Uppercase Blog friendly either. And I really don't want to talk about EULAs here too. :^}

This is cool though. I can add the song I'm currently listening to. **The Long Goodbye** from the album “A Girl Called Eddy” by [A Girl Called Eddy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022728/http:/www.google.com/search?q=%22A%20Girl%20Called%20Eddy%22)
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Use Ecto for your typegirl.com blog, Tiff!
